solution_line_template: 40 slices per watermelon and each slice having 20 black seeds means each watermelon has {black_seeds_per_slice}*{slices_per_watermelon}=<<{black_seeds_per_slice}*{slices_per_watermelon}={total_black_seeds}>>{total_black_seeds} black seeds.

40 slices per watermelon and each slice having 20 white seeds means each watermelon has {white_seeds_per_slice}*{slices_per_watermelon}=<<{white_seeds_per_slice}*{slices_per_watermelon}={total_white_seeds}>>{total_white_seeds} white seeds.
In total, each watermelon has {total_black_seeds}+{total_white_seeds}=<<{total_black_seeds}+{total_white_seeds}={total_seeds}>>{total_seeds} seeds.
